apa kathawe gurunnanseta pasugiya dina kihipayema noyek wada rajakari yedi thibuni.awiweki bawa nisa aduma tharamin sathi dekakin pamana na ganimatada nohaki wiya.thama abalan niwase idiripasa thibu abalan putuwe wadi wu gurunnanse thama kunupiri hisa kasamin idiripasa kadulla desa bala siti.hisa kasana wita hise thattu washayen badi athi kunu siyalla ohuge niyawalata guliwi ambaari yayi.ee siyalla praweshamen hisin ragena putu ande alawamin ada dinaye kumak karamdo yanuwen kalpana karamin sitina gurunnanseta thama niwesa desata yam kisiwaku ena bawa penina.thama dina kihipayakata pera baragath karya ohuta sihipath wuye thama niwasata paminena tharunaya dutu mohotheya.tharunaya enne yanthraya ragena yame balaporoththuweni.dewalaye thibu yanthrada awasan wi atha.dan kalahaki wenayamakda natha.me atharathure guruge niwasata pamini tharunaya guruta wada pasekin thibu kuda putuwaka hida gaththeya....

dagab wahansela pas godaliyayi handunwa me kamentuwa damimata siduwuye ewanima adhama prakashayakata pilithuru dimata siduwu nisaweni…..
sasiwaraya atharathura demala jathika peramunehi madihathwima yojanawata paksha pa්radhana sadhakayak bawata path wi thibuni.
eeth ehema kanna purudu wuna kenekuta hithenne, ara hati lunu, miris thel kanne kohomada kiyala.
me raja aagnyawa asana janathawa podi kasukusuwak nagathi.

ee tharjanaya kirima gana thaman eda wiktoriyanu polisiyata paminili nokale emagin poduwe shri lankawata yam agaruwak siduwe yayi sitha bawath, namuth me wana wita thisara samarasinhage pathwima awalangu karana niyogayak nikuth kara athayi prawruththiyak athi mehothe ese nokaranna yayi pethsamak athsan kirimak mehi wesena shri lankikayin athara siduwemin pawathina nisa thawa duratath nihandawa nositimata sithu bawath, sannasa dot net puwathin jagath je edirisinha wadi duratath pawasa atha.
wage prashna ahana eka nathara kala yuthu bawa, owunwa apahasuthawayata path nokara prashna ahanna api wimasilimath wiya yuthu bawa api ugaththemu.
dayaka mahathmayek me malu kalla daka bhikshuwata kiyanawa ‘hamuduruwane oba wahanse oya malu walandana eka papayak neda?’
mowun nishpadanaya karapu the, kolambaata genna rel parawal idi kala.me rel para nisa samahara sudu mahaththurunge the wathu dekada una.
wiwaha wela labana wasarata awurudu 10 yi.
siyalla sanwidhanaya karapu eka widihata godaya ee sathi deke iskole nogihin hitiya rana wiruwanta upahara washayen.
me pilibanda thawath wisthara dana ganimata dharmawardhana mahathata awashya nam ohu lankawata pamini witeka yaksha gothrika ugathun munagassawiya haki ya

eheth boho niladharin sangawa sitimin ekawara margayata piwisa rathawahana nawathwimath nadu laba ganim sidukarana wita mahajanayagen boho awasthawaladi paminili labi athi athara min polisiyada dosharopanayata lakwana bawa peni gos athi nisa me pilibanda waha siyalu ma rathawahana polis niladharin danuwath kala yuthu bawath ee mahatha penwa deyi.
thindu kala yuthu bawa bas himi sangam pradhrunihu pawasuha.me pilibanda pradhruna bas sangam kihipayaka niyojithayo kolambaadi ada wishesha sakachchawak pawathwimatada niyamithaya.
eeta amatharawa 'pot sitiya' sandahada ru.
awurudu 4kata pasu ohu nikaya sthira kaleya.
eeth mata wishwasa na wage.
oba nodutu lowak eka mamath kiyewwa saho...ekanan marama berillak...@
mama meya dakinne wenath konayakini.
uthuru kurusa yuddha
deshapalanika washayen oya karanawa lihaganna haduwoth menna mehemayi.
me pilibanda adahas dakwu yunayitang guwansewa paripalanaya pawasa aththe mema gataluwa anawabodhaya nisa siduwuwak bawayi.
thawath witaka aya pasal guruwariya menda nithignyawariyak menda sebalayak menda thahanchi panawanniya.

agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha parlimenthuwata idiripath karana lada madhyakalina aarthika prathipaththiya mangin eksath jathika pakshaye saha wathman rajaye aarthikaya prathipaththiya niwaradiwa pahadili wenawa.
13 wana dina ratha්ri 7. 30 ta pamana ma niwase nidagena sitiyadi moratumulla polisiye niladharin hatharadeneku pamina ma athadanguwata gaththa.
oya agalata ehayin thibune maha kalayak.

ee wenuwata paryeshakayo, ekata ek kala wita pa්rajanana, charyamaya ha chiththawega hewath hangim wani sankirna sansiddhiwalata manga padana thanum eekaka kruminta ath dayi yanna danaganimata sakshi ras kalaha.
[duwage daruwanta molligoda pelapatha enna widihak nahane]
mama awurudu 16 – 17 kale pansalaka midule maha ra dutu ganu holmanakata galakin gahuwama holmana budu ammo kiyagena diwwa.
eda ethuma hitiye naha.
siwuru, thuwa,anda athirili.
sathyagrahakaruwanta menma hamudawata da diwa aaharaya labaganime magak nowiya.
oba pusanta aadaraya karanneku nam, daka athi owun his petti samaga sellam kirimata itha priya karana bawa.
surabadu aagnya panatha yatathe niwedana thunak pilibanda pawathi wiwadayedi aandu pakshaye saha wipakshaye mathi amathiwaru dak wu adahas
aya thamantama kiyagaththaya.
eeka ee hati hariyana 'eksplaneshan' ekak neweyi wage..
androyid ap eka methanin labagatha hakiyi.
kammal karayo..madurawo..katusso..mama yanawa ammalage gedara ...
ohuta/ayata meya aarambha kirima sandaha, ohuge/ayage pingana, koppaya saha aahara ganime upakarana thaba athi sthanaya pilibanda dala satahanak penwimata kadadasi pathraya bhawitha karanna.

kalin ba kiyu alwitigalayanma amaradewayange saha obesekarayange rekamadarawa matha ech emwa aniyam wadakayeku lesa sewayata bandawa gaththe jathiye pinata bawa alwitigalayantada pasuwa sithennata atha.
aathmarakshawa sandaha sidu karana kriyawan kisiwitekath aparadhayan nowe.
duppathata eka widiyakya.
nagarika sanwardhana adhikariyatath hamudawa dagaththa.
namuth awurudu kipayakata pasu juwan mata hamuwiya.
kussiye mesaya uda thibuna.
ethana digu polimaki.
ee monawa wunath, kalinma kiwwa wage, ada nan man me sarasenne arunita hondawayin padamak uganwannayi.meka ese mese padamak neme.
eek penne nane.
man palawenima parata maru wenawanan awulak naha.

kalaya ha awakashaya athara pawathina asammatha thaththwayath charitha nirupanaye di charithayan thula pawathna ananyatha lakshana handuna ganime apahasuwath bahira saththawa samanga charitha ki්rayathmaka wimedi abhawya, adbhutha samanya wishwa sadharana mattamen obbata giya siduwim ki්rayathmaka wima yanadi piligatha nohaki karana rashiyak siduwima dakagatha hakiya.
uthsawa sabhawa amathu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha awadharanaya kale yalith me rata tha්rasthawadayata bilidimata wirodhara ranawiruwan sudanam nomathi bawayi.
ohu kudakala patanma sangithayata kamaththen ee gana sewu kenek.
siriyanu kurdiwaru watina thorathuru laba dun bawa da ohu kiweya.
eeta amatharawa shri lankawe athishaya wadagath abhyanthara katayuthu sandaha kisiwakuta madihathwimata ida denne naha.
mama as piyagannawa.....prema kirthi liyapu....wiktar rathnayaka sangithawath karapu....
(buddha shasanaye prayojana ladimi) me udanaya pawasa kawara nam kushalayak kota me sampatha labuwedayi balanne piyumathura buddhapada mulayedi prarthanayak thabuwe yayi.
wiwechanaya thibiya yuththe koyi mattamedayi nodanima - bhashi madhubhashinige giya rasawindanaya pilibanda prashnayaki.
apita ohuwa dewani inimedi adulakunu gananakata dawalimata hakiwi thibunanam me tharagaya nisakawama dinaganna thibuna.
awasan liyumayi obata liyanne
shri lankawe bahutharayak janathawa deshapalakayangen illanne prajathanthrawadaya, ayithin wani karunu nowa thunwela ahara gena daruwanta adhyapanaya laba diya...

delkanda handiyedi dawasak bayik ekaka giyapu ankal kenek wan ekaka happuna api issarahama...mayi yaluwo tikayi gihilla ee ankalwa adala ahakata gannakotayi dakke kakula dekata wenwela kiyala....mage yaluwo serama eyawa athaarala diwwa....eda thamayi mulma parata aththatama ehema darshanayak dakke kaha pata monada manda thibuna kakula pura le widina gaman eyawa paren ahakata gaththayinuth passe thamayi ahala pahala kadawala minissu aawe ussanna....eda api kanna kadayak hoyagena yamin hitiye anthimata yaluwo ekekwath chikan kawe na eda mata chikan kalima pahak hambuna sellamda kollo kiwwalu arun bath ekawath noka iddi mama chikan kali hayakata wade dunna...
me sandaha hambanthota saha monaragala disthrikkaye idam pawaraganna yanawa.
ee kiyanne wishwaya hadila thiyenne mana 4 kin.
ape gedara thiyena parana tiwi eke puluwan antana jak eka gahuwama tiwi balannayi...widiyo pleyar jak deka gahuwama widiyo thati balannayi witharayi.
shri lanka krikat kalamanakaru asanka gurusinha mahatha prakasha kara aththe me wanawita mathiws tharagayata sahabhagi wima sadaha siyayata 70 ka pamana yogyathawakin pasuwana bawaya.
mahindagamanayata pera apata sanwidhanaya wu dewa wishwasayak pawathi bawata sadhaka naha.
methana indan baluwama hamoma hadissiye kohe hari yanawa wage.
ohu obawa warnana karanawada?
hithala kopula obe mage uraha...
mata ehema da?

noyekuth anargha manik walin sarasu chaithyayaka dhathun nidan kota athi bawath ema saye padipela mula dama athi gal thalaya shri lankawe athi siyalu manik walata wada watina bawath pawasana na raju wadi garu buhuman labana thanakin adu buhuman labena thanakata me dhathun gena yannata thathkarana bawa thamanta nopenenne dayida asayi.
aththatama porata ehema kolambaa awith katahari kambauranda tharam aheniyak thibbe na, paramparawen porata salakiyayuthu depalak labila thibba .
ee wage, kenekwa papayen galawagaththath eya digatama wishwasawanthawa wada kale nathnam eyata galawima ahimi weyi.
- dulan dasanayaka-
me siyallanma bera ganimata mulin minisa jiwath wimath athyawashya deyak.

deshiya uuruwata galapena aakarayata sahal aashi්ratha nishpadana soya ulundu piti ha kiri aashi්ratha nishpadana prachalitha kirimata katayuthu karagena yayi.deshiya aahara boga gowibimwalata gos gowingen sadharana milakata miladigena owunge athamita saru karawimata kriya karana athara ema aahara boga nishpadana athulath aahara mallak sahanadayi milata sama sewaka pawulakatama labadimata mulikawa piyawara gane.
charitha ghathana saha gatum bahulaya.
ahamben hari ehema wunath obata wadi dawasak yanna kalin hingannek wenna wenawa.

pilibandawa danaganimata widyagnyayo boho kalayaka sita noyek aakaraye paryeshana ha adhyanayan magin uthsaha dara thibe.masa kihipayakata pera snayu wisheshagnyayin kandayamak apa miya yana wita molayata siduwanne kumak da yanna pahadili karana owunge atham wishmayajanaka paryeshana thorathuru wartha kara thibe.
me komantuwa ma makuwe ehi nirlajjitha numbaage lankuwa hethuwen.
api me minis lokaye gatha karanne itha ma tika kalaya yi.

ehema patan ganna kotama demala jathika sandhanaye pirisak gath me thiranaya ma dakinne, demala janathawage prarthana, aramunu gana abamal renuwak tharam hithanne nathiwa gath athi bihisunu thiranayak lesayi.demala jathika sandhanaya kiyanne eltitiee sanwidhanaye nishpadanayak.
awasanaye wenath shilpiniyak yoda handa kawimata siduwiya.
kanna labune pan peththak ekath ekko welila nathinam themila.
eya 2013/2014 adhyayana warshaya wanawita rupiyal 39600 dakwa ihala nanwa atha.
ee kale kochchara rahada kiyala hithenne ape ammala thaththala eyalage lamakale mathakkaraddi.
wargikaranayata anuwa lakunu 10 /7.9 pramanayak himi karaganimata haki wi thibenawa.
eya ema kutiye ek pasak purama wihidunu tharamak wishala sayanayak wu bawin pramanawath idakadak ehi thibini.
